name: Historical day tour in HoChiMinh city
description:
i have a special friend, older than me 30 years old from England, he always ask me about the history of VietNam and ask me "why you dont hold a tour for foreigner who wanna know about VietNam's great history"... i thought about it and go to learn about some special places in HoChiMinh city. 

Wish everyone will join with me on this tour
